name: Bari - The Fisher Plane
description:
Embark on the finest plane of the Adriatic sea and help villagers to get food !! The game is inspired by Porco Rosso. The theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres" and we tried to make a plane fishing game.

Use WASD or Arrows to control the plane.

Shift to boost

Space to drop your shipment.

You have to fly around the sea to spot some fishes. You can then capture them by flying close to the surface of the water. You can then bring back your shipment to the villagers. You have to bring the right color of fish to the corresponding villages.

Thanks for playing :)

A game made by Nao Argouse, Victor Depardieu, Tim Guthmann, Boris Kolimaga, and Anton Salikhov for the Ludum Dare 41.
